# tf.compat.v1.flags.get_help_width


<table class="tfo-notebook-buttons tfo-api" align="left">
</table>



Returns the integer width of help lines that is used in TextWrap.

### Aliases:

* `tf.compat.v1.app.flags.get_help_width`


``` python
tf.compat.v1.flags.get_help_width()
```
